Welcome to ACG

With a presence in 138 countries on six continents, ACG is now the world’s largest integrated supplier and service provider to solid dosage manufacturers –providing hard shell capsules, barrier packaging solutions, track and trace systems, and process, packing and vision inspection equipment.

We make it better, so you can make it better, and together we can make people better.

Integrated solutions

Uniquely involved in all aspects of solid dosage production, only ACG can offer holistic manufacturing advice and solutions. Things work better when they’re designed to work together, and having fewer suppliers also means simpler accountability if things go wrong.

Everything capsules

Only ACG knows every aspect of manufacturing with capsules. This positions us uniquely to help.

EXPLORE CAPSULES
Everything tablets

Make them. Check them. Package them. Track them. Only ACG does it all.

EXPLORE TABLETS
Products

ACG touches almost every aspect of oral dosage manufacturing. Our holistic view is based on a belief that this is the best approach to enabling seamless production alongside fully accountable service.

Capsules

A range of HPMC and gelatin capsules for almost every pharma and nutra application.

EXPLORE CAPSULES
Machinery

Equipment, tooling and consumables for near end-to-end oral dosage production.

EXPLORE MACHINERY

One Lab. All the Tests*

Comprehensive botanical and fungi testing from your favorite independent, quality-obsessed ISO accredited lab.

Learn More About Our Expanded Services
VIEW THE PROGRAM

Alkemist Labs is an established leader in botanical plant testing, with expanded capabilities in phytochemical potency analysis, encompassing all herbs in commerce. We are proud members of the natural products community, serving botanical suppliers and dietary supplement manufacturers. 

Full method transparency, personalized technical support, and unrivaled customer service are our hallmarks.  With our undisputed expertise in this very specialized area of analytical testing, we can help ensure that your products meet your label claims.

Our Certificate of Analysis includes everything needed to reproduce the analysis, and defend the results in front of cGMP compliance auditors.  We also provide de-jargoned versions of test results suitable for consumers, which many clients include in their transparency programs.

View Participating Brand & Products

What Would You Like to Test?

Confirming botanical genus, species, and plant part is the first step of testing your sample.

You not only need to know what your material is, you need to know how strong the constituents may be.

We screen for heavy metals, residual solvents, and pesticides to the highest standards.

Unparalleled Support

Our support ranges from guiding you through selection of botanical reference materials, to determining what tests are appropriate, to facilitating resolution if testing discrepancies arise, with the end result of your having confidence in your products, and the tools to demonstrate it to regulators and customers. Our four-day turnaround time for routine identity testing keeps your production schedule on track.

AMERICAN HERBAL PHARMACOPOEIA®
AHP is a non-profit 501(c)(3) educational organization dedicated to promoting the responsible use of herbal products and herbal medicines. Our work relies on a worldwide network of experts, including botanists, chemists, herbalists, medical doctors, pharmacists, and pharmacologists.

The Beneficial Plant Research Association and McKenna Academy of Natural Philosophy

In 1979, integrative medicine pioneer and AHP Medical Advisor Dr. Andrew Weil (University of Arizona) founded the non-profit Beneficial Plant Research Association (BPRA) to underscore the importance of medicinal plants in human health. The primary mission of the association is to collect and disseminate knowledge from diverse cultures, moving away from a US-centric approach to healthcare that bridges the gap between traditional practices and modern medicine, fostering a new system of health care that prioritizes well-being over profit.

AHP Monographs
AHP produces critically reviewed herbal monographs that represent the most comprehensive and authoritative documentation on herbal medicines in the English language. Visit the AHP Shop to purchase monographs in print or downloadable PDFs.
Botanical Reference Materials
AHP provides verified botanical reference standards to natural products manufacturers, medical libraries, analytical labs, and research institutions, worldwide.
Botanical Identification Services
AHP offers a range of botanical identification services. Customers can provide their own specimen for authentication or AHP can arrange for a specimen to be ethically collected on their behalf.
AHP Membership
All AHP members receive exclusive benefits, including a digital subscription to AHP’s News & Views updates and our quarterly Herbal QRS (Quality, Research, Safety) Bulletin.
AHP Monographs Under Development
Triphala, Amla, Bellerica, Haritaki Monographs and Therapeutic Compendiums
	
The American Herbal Pharmacopoeia (AHP) is proposing to develop four AHP Monographs and Therapeutic Compendiums for the three individual Triphala fruits (Phyllanthus emblica, Terminalia bellirica, Terminalia chebula) and the Triphala combination. Terminalia bellirica has just been published.

The individual fruits in Triphala are some of the most important herbal compounds in the Ayurvedic materia medica and Triphala is by far the most important formula in Ayurveda for promoting human health. It is used in both detoxification therapies, especially prior to engaging in panchakarma therapy, is used as a rejuvenative tonic , and used for health maintenance, making it one of the most versatile herbal cleansers and tonifers avaiable. It is also among the oldest continually used formula on the planet, in use for more than 1200 years. This alone makes this formula and its ingredients worth learning about.

Behind the Scenes at Red Dog Casino: An In-depth Look into Its Cutting-Edge Software and Technologies

At the heart of Red Dog Casino's thrilling gaming experience lies the work of a well-renowned software provider - RealTime Gaming (RTG). As a leading figure in the online gaming industry, RTG is recognized for its comprehensive range of games, smooth performance, and eye-catching graphics.

A Diverse Range of Games: RTG's software suite encompasses hundreds of different games, providing an extensive collection for all types of players. Whether you are a fan of classic slots, modern video slots, table games, or even progressive jackpots, Red Dog Casino, backed by RTG, caters to your preferences.
Smooth Performance: RTG's robust software platform ensures Red Dog Casino operates flawlessly across different devices, providing a seamless gaming experience whether you're playing on a PC, a tablet, or a smartphone.
High-Quality Graphics: The software brings high-quality graphics and immersive sound effects, enhancing the overall gaming experience by creating an environment reminiscent of a real-world casino.
Secure Transactions: The Power of Secure Socket Layer (SSL) Technology

Red Dog Casino's commitment to user safety and secure transactions is underscored by its use of Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology. This technology encrypts user information, keeping personal and financial data safe from cyber threats.

Encryption: SSL technology protects user information by encrypting data before transmission. This makes the data unreadable to any unauthorized person, safeguarding user privacy.
Authenticity: The use of SSL also verifies the server's identity, ensuring that the data is being sent to the correct server, not an impostor.
Integrity: SSL ensures data integrity during transmission, preventing any unauthorized alterations to the data during transmission.
Mobile Compatibility: Responsive Design and Mobile App

Acknowledging the rise of mobile gaming, Red Dog Casino's website and games have been optimized to provide a smooth experience on mobile devices.

Responsive Web Design: Whether on a desktop or a mobile device, the Red Dog Casino website automatically adjusts its layout, ensuring that players have an enjoyable browsing experience.
Mobile App: Red Dog Casino also offers a dedicated app for both iOS and Android devices. The app mirrors the website in functionality, providing a seamless transition for players who prefer mobile gaming.
Game Optimization: The games at Red Dog Casino are mobile-optimized, ensuring they run smoothly on various screen sizes without compromising gameplay quality or speed.

4. Fair Play: The Relevance of Random Number Generator (RNG)

Fair play is at the heart of any respectable online casino. To ensure this, Red Dog Casino utilizes a Random Number Generator (RNG) for game outcomes.

Impartiality: The RNG guarantees that all game outcomes are entirely random, ensuring a fair and unbiased gaming experience.
Regular Testing: To maintain trust and integrity, the RNG at Red Dog Casino undergoes regular auditing by independent bodies. This ensures the RNG is functioning correctly and providing genuinely random results.
Equal Winning Opportunities: Because the RNG generates completely random results, every player at Red Dog Casino has an equal chance of winning, regardless of their gaming history.

With a strong software foundation, secure transaction technology, mobile compatibility, and a commitment to fair play, Red Dog Casino stands out as an advanced, user-friendly online gaming platform. It's a blend of cutting-edge technology and customer-centric features that makes playing at Red Dog Casino a truly enjoyable experience.

THE GOLD STANDARD IN CERTIFICATION AND TESTING

Banned Substances Control Group (BSCG) is the gold standard in third-party certification and testing for banned substances and our seals represent superior brands and quality. As an international leader in the industry for almost 20 years, BSCG provides services to the dietary supplement, natural product, cosmetic, homeopathic, and CBD product communities. Built on a foundation of 25 years at the forefront of anti-doping and sport drug testing BSCG brings the Olympic standard in analytical testing to third party certification and testing. We offer a complete suite of certification programs as well as ingredient and environmental contaminant testing and GMP audit and compliance services. Third-party certification is available to finished product brands, ingredient suppliers, and manufacturing facilities. Our Athlete Assurance Program is offered to teams, leagues, athletes or other consumers looking for independent banned substance testing. Certifications are designed to verify products have what they claim on the label and are not contaminated with harmful environmental agents, substances on the WADA Prohibited List, or other drugs that can lead to health concerns or positive drug tests. Frequency of testing and specifics vary by program. Certified products can be found by entering lot number, product, brand, category, form, or other keywords in the search box above or below each program outlined below. Certified manufacturers also have a search box. At BSCG, we have a program for you!

CERTIFIED DRUG FREE

Our flagship program tests every finished product lot, or monthly for ingredients, for an industry leading 507 banned substances offering superior quality and anti-doping protection to athletes, military service members, first responders, and consumers. Includes annual verification of label claims and contaminant testing and an initial quality control and compliance audit for GMP or other relevant regulations.

SEARCH PROGRAM
READ MORE

CERTIFIED QUALITY

Designed for consumer protection and retail compliance this annual testing program verifies product quality for retailers and consumers. Testing includes label claims, heavy metals, pesticides, microbiological agents and more than 507 banned substances. An initial quality control and compliance audit for GMP or other relevant regulations is included. Certified Quality annual testing is not designed for anti-doping protection.

SEARCH PROGRAM
READ MORE

CERTIFIED CBD

Designed for CBD products this program combines banned substance protection, label claim and contaminant testing, and an initial review of manufacturing quality control and compliance in one program. Every lot is tested for 507 banned substances and cannabinoids to verify CBD claims and THC limits for drug testing protection with every tenth lot screened for heavy metals, pesticides, and microbiological agents.

SEARCH PROGRAM
READ MORE

CERTIFIED GMP

Offered to manufacturers and brands this program conducts onsite audits of manufacturing, packaging, or holding facilities to ensure compliance with current Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) for dietary supplements or food including 21 CFR 110, 111, and 117. We can also audit to other GMP guidelines for OTC drugs or cosmetics. We have a two year audit cycle and experienced independent auditors.

SEARCH PROGRAM
READ MORE

Certified Facility

This new program for manufacturers combines banned substance risk management with random quarterly testing of products for label claims, environmental contaminants, and more than 507 banned substances. Requires GMP audit by BSCG or another qualified provider and a review of the ingredient list for banned substances. Discounts on other programs may be offered to clients as a benefit.

SEARCH PROGRAM

ABOUT BSCG

BSCG was created in 2004 with the goal of bringing the Olympic standard in drug testing to third-party certification and testing of dietary supplements and nutrition products. We call it the gold standard as a nod to Olympic glory and a commitment to excellence. With 25 years of leadership in sport drug testing US anti-doping guru Dr. Don Catlin founded BSCG along with his son Oliver Catlin, a business executive and respected banned substances and dietary supplement expert, and Ryan Connolly, a leading anti-doping, business and civil litigation attorney. The aim was to provide banned substance protection for brands in the nutrition industry to ensure athletes, military service members, first responders and consumers have safe supplement options that contain what they claim and are free of WADA Prohibited Substances and other drug contaminants. Over 20 years BSCG has expanded into a full service third-party certification and testing provider offering banned substance testing, label claims and ingredient verification, environmental contaminant testing, GMP audit and compliance services and more.

INDUSTRY LEADING BANNED SUBSTANCE TESTING

The BSCG Industry Leading Banned Substance Testing Menu covers more than 507 drugs including 296 on the WADA Prohibited List and 209 Prescription, Over-the-Counter, or Illicit drugs not banned in sport.

PROUDLY RECOGNIZED BY

NIH Office of Dietary Supplements, Drug Free Sport, UFC, LPGA, NBA, CrossFit, U.S. DOD Operation Supplement Safety, Sport Nutrition and Dietitian Japan (SNDJ), Canadian Olympic Committee, Anti-Doping Authority Netherlands, High Performance Sport New Zealand (HPSNZ), New Zealand Defence Force Health, Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics, Voluntary Anti-Doping Association (VADA) and others. Check out the details.

BANNED SUBSTANCE CERTIFICATION COMPARISON CHART

The BSCG is the Clear Choice. Check out a Comparison Chart of Third Party Certification for Banned Substances– BSCG Certified Drug Free vs NSF Certified for Sport vs Informed Sport or Informed Choice.

Ensuring Integrity Through Third-Party Supplement Certification

When it comes to ensuring the safety and integrity of dietary supplements, third-party supplement certification is paramount. These certifications, backed by independent lab testing supplements, provide consumers with the assurance that the products they consume meet rigorous quality standards. Whether it's third-party dietary supplement certification or certification for sports supplements, the presence of these seals signifies a commitment to transparency and trustworthiness in the industry. By undergoing best third-party supplement testing, manufacturers demonstrate their dedication to delivering safe and reliable products, free from any banned substances that could jeopardize the health and performance of athletes.




Athletes, in particular, rely on certifications like sports supplement certification and anti-doping certification to navigate the complex landscape of performance-enhancing drugs testing. These certifications not only ensure compliance with regulations but also underscore a commitment to ethical practices. With quality assurance in sports supplements, consumers can confidently choose products that have undergone rigorous third-party testing for supplements, knowing that they are investing in their health and athletic pursuits responsibly. Through banned substance testing and sports nutrition certification, the industry upholds standards of excellence, fostering a culture of integrity and accountability in the realm of dietary supplementation.

Law Office of Bayne & Associates

Based in Washington D.C., the Law Office of Bayne & Associates specializes in food, drug, medical device, and cosmetic law, with a special focus on matters concerning the regulation of conventional foods, medical foods, dietary supplements, and botanical products by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, Federal Trade Commission, U.S. Department of Agriculture, U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and other federal and state regulatory agencies.

 

The firm was founded in 2001 by Holly Bayne, who brings a unique blend of industry and marketing experience to the practice of law. The firm’s goal is to offer companies engaged in the development, manufacture, sale, and marketing of FDA-regulated products a seasoned and practical approach to regulatory compliance in a highly-competitive marketplace and rapidly evolving digital age. The firm routinely advises companies on a wide range of issues, including the regulatory status of ingredients, GRAS conclusions, new dietary ingredient (NDI) notifications, labeling, advertising and promotional activities, claim substantiation, cGMP compliance, inspections, food safety, product recalls, FSMA compliance, and related areas.  The firm also provides business and strategic planning advice for companies engaged in the sale and marketing of FDA-regulated products, including drafting and negotiating manufacturing, supply, licensing and clinical trial agreements, scientific expert consultation, and litigation support, among other areas.

The Perfect Combination for Vascular Health

At Calroy Health Sciences, we translate breakthrough science into products without parallel. Through rigorous research and formulation, we develop transformative new solutions for foundational health.

The world’s premier supplement to support the endothelial glycocalyx,* the fragile inner lining of the entire vascular system. MonitumRS is scientifically shown to protect and restore the endothelial glycocalyx.†

Calroy's 2-in-1 Nitric Oxide Test Strips

Measuring your nitric oxide levels offers valuable health and wellness insights.

With patent-pending dual-pad testing, Calroy’s 2-in-1 Nitric Oxide Test Strips measure both prebiotic diet by measuring prebiotic nitrate levels and nitric oxide through salivary nitrite biomarkers.

SHOP
Why Endothelial Glycocalyx Support?

Discovered only in recent decades, the endothelial glycocalyx (EGX) is the key to vascular health. It is an upstream target for supporting vascular health. Since the vascular system supports every single organ and system in the body, it has transformative potential for lifelong health and wellness.

SHOP ARTEROSIL HP
Vascular Health Is Foundational Health

Every organ and system in your body relies upon the oxygen, nutrients, and other molecules delivered by your vascular system. Since vascular health underpins overall health, taking care of your vascular health can change your life.

Learn more about how to support and maintain your vascular health.*

EDUCATION
Committed to Research

Our mission is to advance science and enhance health – and our model combines rigorous research, development, and testing with an exacting approach to sourcing, manufacturing, and transparency.

Learn how our model has resulted in advancements in understanding and science.

EXPLORE THE RESEARCH
Advancing Science. Enhancing Health.

At Calroy, it starts with a discovery – a study or finding that warrants a second look. With collaborative research and experimentation, it becomes a breakthrough. And through our process of sourcing, formulation, testing, and rigorous clinical research, it yields dietary supplements with transformative potential for lifelong health and wellness.*

Meet our team and learn more about our approach.

OUR STORY
What is Arterosil HP?

All vascular health relies on a healthy endothelial glycocalyx, the fragile inner lining of the entire vascular system. Arterosil HP® supports the structure and normal function of the endothelial glycocalyx.* Calroy’s proprietary MonitumRS® seaweed extract, the core ingredient in Arterosil HP, is scientifically shown to protect and restore the endothelial glycocalyx.†

†As demonstrated in an independent third-party laboratory in vitro study.

ARTEROSIL HP
What is Vascanox HP?

Vascanox HP® is a next-generation product providing nitric oxide support for up to 24 hours with a single dose.*† Vascanox HP is powered by Calroy’s proprietary blend, Noxa24®, to support the natural production, storage, and release of nitric oxide.*

Optimal nitric oxide levels have been shown to:

Support a healthy cardiovascular system*
Support and maintain blood pressure in the normal range*
Support healthy circulation*

Calroy’s proprietary Vascanox HP formula targets nitric oxide metabolism, using multiple pathways.

†As measured by saliva NO test strips in an open label published study.

VASCANOX HP

CAMAG – ADVANCED HPTLC SOLUTIONS. SWISS MADE.

GET A CONSULTATION
Our customers

CAMAG – ADVANCED HPTLC SOLUTIONS FOR THE ANALYSIS OF COMPLEX SAMPLES

HPTLC – THE OTHER HIGH-PERFORMANCE CHROMATOGRAPHY
Visual evaluation and flexible use
Multiple detection of separated analytes
Reproducible analysis and reliable quantification and more

HPTLC is a versatile and powerful analytical technique used in various fields for its efficiency, accuracy, and ability to handle complex samples, commonly employed for the separation, identification, and quantification of components in complex matrices.

CAMAG’s advanced HPTLC solutions enable the simultaneous analysis of multiple samples on a single plate, greatly enhancing throughput and decreasing analysis time.

HPTLC offers great separation and detection capabilities, making it possible to detect low concentrations of analytes.

HPTLC delivers precise, efficient, and cost-effective analysis across diverse applications.

Identification of botanicals is a very complicated process. The standard tools in the industry to identify materials typically cannot be used to identify botanicals, because with botanicals you are dealing with a species, a genus and even down to a plant part. In order for the product to be efficacious, we have to make sure that we have the proper genus, the proper species and the proper plant part. So one of the only methods in the industry that can test down to that level in detail is TLC, or in our case we’ve invested in the High-Performance TLC machine and that is what we use to identify botanicals.

 

Jenna Farr, Quality Assurance Manager, Nature’s Way Brands

APPLICATION FIELDS
Herbal Drug Analysis
HPTLC is the method of choice for complex matrices, providing visual identity confirmation, rapid sample comparison, adulteration checks, purity monitoring, and marker compound quantification.
Food Analysis
HPTLC effectively handles complex and diverse food matrices and is commonly used for quality control, testing for additives, and screening for food contaminants.
Forensic Analysis
HPTLC enables the rapid and reliable screening of multiple complex biological samples for substances such as drugs of abuse, regulated pharmaceuticals, and other compounds.
Biotechnology Analysis
HPTLC is a robust, cost-effective technique for analyzing complex matrices, supporting process control, quality control, and cleaning validation with minimal preparation and multi-mode detection.
Cosmetics Analysis
HPTLC ensures the quality and authenticity of cosmetic ingredients, such as plant extracts and essential oils, ensuring the safety of cosmetic products.
Pharmaceutical Analysis
HPTLC efficiently and accurately analyzes multiple samples simultaneously, ensuring high-resolution identification and quantification of active ingredients and impurities.
Chemical Analysis
HPTLC is used to separate, identify, and quantify chemical compounds in various industries, ensuring product quality. It aids in detecting impurities.
Environmental
HPTLC is ideal for monitoring water quality and analyzing chemical residues in environmental samples like soil and wastewater. Coupled with effect-directed analysis, it detects known and unknown toxins.
Other
HPTLC is used in research and for routine quality control purposes. It allows for analysis of divers analytes gained directly from any complex matrix.

CoQ10 Association Membership

Exclusive resources, content, professional development, networking, and community.

Our Mission

The CoQ10 Association is committed to fostering transparency, promoting education, and facilitating collaboration within the industry. We believe that proactive and purposeful efforts, such as testing CoQ10 products, benefit industry stakeholders and empower consumers to make informed decisions about their health.

ABOUT US
Our Goals

We strive to bring structure and intention to CoQ10’s exponential market growth and foster dialogue between leading CoQ10 industry members, healthcare professionals, and consumers. We maintain superior quality and marketing standards through research and testing.

READ MORE
Benefits of Membership

Over the past two decades, the Coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10) industry has met challenges, including concerns regarding ingredient manufacturer transparency, conflicting study results, supply shortages, legal disputes, changes in manufacturing leadership, and more. The CoQ10 Association meets those needs with:

    • Exclusive Resources and Content
    • Professional Development
    • Networking and Community
    • Research and Testing

JOIN US
Member Highlights

The CoQ10 Association invites all industry professionals, researchers, and enthusiasts to join us in this exciting new chapter. Membership is open to individuals and organizations committed to advancing CoQ10 science and industry standards.

JOIN US

CoQ10 Transparency in Your Hands

Found in almost every cell of the human body, CoQ10 delivers energy and antioxidants that protect the body from free radicals and chronic conditions caused by cell damage. Taking CoQ10 supplements is an important part of health and wellness routines. But how much do you know about the CoQ10 brand you select? Is the label reliable? Does the manufacturer publish and share information with you about their formulation and manufacturing process? The CoQ10 Association™ developed the proprietary CoQ10 Score to help consumers feel confident when making a CoQ10 selection.

Discovering the Drug Development Pathway for Botanicals
Cultivate Biologics is a botanical drug development company focused on bringing certainty and precision to botanical-based drugs, with a current focus on hemp-derived, full spectrum cannabinoids. Cultivate developed a novel process for making botanicals viable for FDA-approved drug applications. Our superior plant breeding program and ability to replicate complex plant extracts with precision make it possible to discover the untapped potential of botanicals for human and animal health.
View Our Clinical Research
The Benefits of Nature, the Dependability of Science
Our novel botanical drug development process is capable of characterizing and reproducing complex botanical extracts that consist of thousands of individual compounds with pharmaceutical grade precision. From plant breeding through final manufacturing Cultivate operates under tightly controlled conditions in order to meet FDA’s rigorous chemistry, manufacturing, and controls criteria for complex botanical extracts.

Precision & Consistency

Safety

Efficacy

Learn More
Precision Agricultural Pipeline

Our wholly owned botanical supply chain creates a closed-loop development process infusing consistency and reliability into a once highly variable botanical extract supply chain. 

Botanical Science
Research Collaborations

With mutual objectives to discover the medicinal benefits of botanicals, we not only have our own robust research program pursing botanical drugs for both humans and animals, but we also fund studies and provide materials that accelerate botanical-based drug development using our consistent, research-backed, full spectrum cannabinoid extracts.

Inquire About a Research Collaboration

Where it Began

Unlocking the Therapeutic Potential of Hemp
Cultivate created a specialized formulation for ElleVet Sciences, which is the only CBD + CBDA product proven to work in multiple clinical trials. This botanical extract changed the trajectory of veterinary science for the treatment of several conditions in dogs and we are currently conducting clinical studies to pursue similar breakthroughs in human health.

ENI

Ethical Naturals, Inc. (ENI) supplies the highest-grade, botanical based ingredients, and manufactures custom finished products in our NSF-certified cGMP facility.

 Our Products

Since 2005, Ethical Naturals, Inc. (ENI) has been an industry leader in the supply of premium botanical and natural source ingredients to companies throughout the world. Today, our range includes: AlphaWave® L-Theanine, GreenGrown® Glucosamine, Cranberex® Cranberry, PureLeaf™ Ginkgo biloba, ResveraTrue® resveratrol and other signature ingredients. In addition to these unique ingredients, ENI maintains its position as a leading supplier of premium quality, standardized botanical extracts (for a full range of our products see
our Products section).

A key difference between ENI and other ingredient suppliers is that the ENI facility, where all our ingredients are QA tested, is certified to comply with the GMP Certification Program Requirements of NSF/ANSI 455-2 that includes FSMA and cGMP (21 CFR 111), (21 CFR 117).

When you work with ENI, you’ll always have the Quality Assurance back-up you need.

read more 

 Quality Assurance

ENI is one of the few raw material suppliers certified to comply with the GMP Certification Program Requirements of NSF/ANSI 455-2 that includes FSMA and cGMP (21 CFR 111), (21 CFR 117). This registration and certification covers our supply chain, testing laboratory, distribution and manufacturing divisions. This robust QA program assures that our ingredients will comply in every way with your company’s highest standards and certifications.

read more 

 Supplement Manufacturing

ENI provides premium supplement encapsulation and bottling services at our custom built, solar powered, Redwood City manufacturing facility. Through this system we can provide your company with any of our ingredients in finished product form, saving you time, work and money. With our full-spectrum sourcing, testing and manufacturing capabilities, we commit to:

Help you satisfy today’s ever-increasing regulatory and consumer affairs requirements
Guarantee product safety from Field to Finished Product®
Offer significant economies in raw material supply, R & D, and finished product processing

お知らせ

【年末年始休業のお知らせ】

年末年始休業のお知らせ 平素は格別のご高配を賜り、厚くお礼申し上げます。 誠に勝手ながら、弊社では12月30日（月）より年末年始の休業とさせて頂きます。 【休業期間】 2024年12月30日(月) ～...

株式会社グローバルニュートリショングループは、健康・栄養産業における調査・分析、戦略の策定・実施について豊富な経験を持つコンサルティング企業です。

さらに詳しく

BUSINESS

事業案内

情報サービス

月2回、日本のウェルネスフード市場に関するニュース＆分析を提供しています。
さらに、世界のウェルネスフード市場に関連するニュースや業界専門誌もご紹介しています。

さらに詳しく

コンサルティング

ウェルネスフードに特化したビジネスのコンサルティングを行っております。
現在まで、国内外合わせて750件以上のプロジェクトを実施してまいりました。

さらに詳しく

機能性表示食品制度に精通

売れる機能性表示食品の商品開発をサポート

機能性表示食品制度が始まり5年以上、様々な変遷を経て制度は進化しています。現在、ただ届出して機能性を表示するだけでは売れるとは限りません。これからは制度を熟知、活用して、いかに売れる商品を開発するかを逆算し、企業自らヒットを仕掛けていく時代に突入しています。

ガイドライン公表前から全国で勉強会を実施し、これまでに300件を超す届出サポート・相談に携わるGNGは、文字通り機能性表示食品制度に精通するパイオニアかつエキスパートです。数多くの事例から導き出されたノウハウで、ヒットを生み出す「逆算式商品開発」を推進し、最短・確実な届出をバックアップします。

さらに詳しく

GNG
研究会

世界中から流れ込む情報の洪水の中から
価値ある情報を厳選しタイムリーに提供する
日本で唯一の健康食品ビジネスに特化した会員制サービス
「グローバルニュートリション研究会（GNG研究会）」。

日本を代表する健康・食品・栄養業界のトップランナーから
価値ある情報源として選ばれています。

さらに詳しく

このような方におすすめです

健康食品・栄養・食に関する国内・海外の最新トレンドを先取りしたい方
機能性表示食品制度を活用し、売れる健康食品を開発したい方
時間をかけずに効率よく、要点をしぼった情報収集を行いたい方
最新情報を日常的に手に入れ、自社の強みを生かした将来参入カテゴリーおよび新商品開発を模索したい方
競合他社の動向を定点観測し、戦略的に差別化を図りたい方
日本だけではなく海外からの情報も積極的に入手したいが、英語に不安のある方

The Global Organization for EPA & DHA Omega-3s

GOED represents the worldwide EPA and DHA omega-3 industry, and our membership is built on a quality standard unparalleled in the market. Our mission is to increase consumption of EPA and DHA omega-3s, regardless of the source, and ensure that our members produce quality products that consumers can trust.

Member benefits
There are many reasons to join GOED. Here are just a few:
You gain credibility by aligning with GOED's quality standard
You are supporting global education efforts for consumers, media and influencers
You make connections by leveraging our extensive member network
You gain access to proprietary market research and members-only data
See what joining GOED can do for your business »

Corporate Transparency Act Task Force
On Jan. 1, 2024, the Corporate Transparency Act (CTA) took effect, requiring non-exempt U.S. entities and non-exempt foreign entities registered to do business in the United States to submit beneficial ownership information (BOI) reports to a confidential database maintained by the U.S. Department of the Treasury’s Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN).

Lemon Balm Improves Sleep Quality In Placebo-Controlled RCT

By Janet Gulland, Contributing Writer

Melissa officinalis, known colloqually as Lemon Balm, has a venerable history of use as a relaxant, anxiolytic, and sleep aid. A new study shows nightly supplementation with a phytosomal extract of this plant improved sleep quality in a cohort of people with insomnia (Photo: Cristina Ionescu/Shutterstock)

These days, a lot of people could use some help in the sleep department. For many of them, phytosomal extract of Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) could be just the ticket.

Data from a recent double-blind crossover study of 30 people with chronic insomnia show that nightly supplementation with 400 mg of Melissa officinalis Phytosome® (Indena), taken 30 minutes prior to bedtime, markedly reduced composite Insomnia Severity Index (ISI) scores and increased the amount of time spent in restorative slow-wave sleep.

The findings were strong enough to prompt lead investigator Francesco Di Pierro, PhD, of the University of Insubria, Varese, Italy, to consider this form of M. officinalis a “viable alternative to pharmaceutical treatments for insomnia, offering a natural and potentially safer option for individuals seeking relief from sleep disorders.”

Clinical Pearls for Weight-Health Wins, with Calocurb—A Natural GLP-1 Activator

Written by Erik Goldman

VIEW WEBINAR

GLP-1 receptor agonists are transforming clinical practices and protocols for significant weight-health wins.

In this free webinar, you will learn the science behind a clinically-proven natural GLP-1 activator called Calocurb, and how it can be used with and without prescription medications. You’ll discover a supplement derived from hops, and clinically shown to reduce cravings by 40%, hunger by 30%, and average calorie intake by 18%.

Find out how this powerful dietary supplement can play a role in holistic patient care. Edward Walker PhD, of the New Zealand Institute of Plant & Food Research will present key findings from 14 years of clinical research and $30m investment in plant-based GLP-1 activation.

Renowned functional nutrition expert, Ashley Koff RD, will offer insight on the clinical use of Calocurb.

You’ll learn about:

The role of bitter taste receptors in the activation of GLP-1, CCK, and PYY
The levels of GLP-1, CCK, and PYY required for gut-brain connection
The science supporting Amarasate, a bitter hop extract, a key ingredient in the Calocurb formula.
The value of optimizing endogenous GLP-1 (and partner hormones) for all patients
Differentiating key nutritional needs for patients taking GLP-1 agonists, and those weaning off of them.
VIEW WEBINAR

Sponsored by Calocurb

Edward Walker, PhD is a scientist and lecturer who believes that developing a healthy relationship with food is key to long-term wellness.  He completed his PhD at the University of Auckland on the antioxidant effects of berry fruits, and has continued to research how dietary plant compounds can improve health and wellness. Dr. Walker works at The New Zealand Institute of Plant and Food Research undertaking commercially-focused research on clinically validated nutraceutical products for human health applications.  He is also a guest lecturer at the University of Auckland on the topic of nutraceuticals and functional foods.  He has headed 14 years’ worth of clinical research on Amarasate, the active ingredient in Calocurb.

Ashley Koff, RD, is an award-winning personalized nutrition expert with 25+ years’ experience helping thousands of people achieve better health powered by better nutrition. As founder of The Better Nutrition Program (BNP), Koff helms a team of clinicians, coaches, and digital health experts delivering personalized nutrition at scale, and offering a GLP-1 practitioner protocol package to optimize patient outcomes. Koff is also the Nutrition Director for the University of California Irvine Susan Samueli Integrative Health Institute’s Integrative and Functional Medicine Fellowship. She’s the author of 2 books, with a third coming in January 2026.

HPTLC ASSOCIATION

The International Association for the Advancement of High Performance Thin Layer Chromatography (HPTLC Association) promotes the use of HPTLC in plant analysis and other analytical fields. The Association brings together representatives from academia, industry, research, regulatory and standard setting bodies.

HPTLC METHOD COLLECTION

More than 300 methods for the identification of herbal drugs and the identification of substance classes are available for free download from the HPTLC Association’s method collection. All methods strictly follow the Association’s HPTLC Standard Operating Procedure. Many of the methods were adopted in pharmacopoeial monographs for herbal drugs or dietary supplements.

THE INTERNATIONAL ATLAS FOR IDENTIFICATION OF HERBAL DRUGS

In a collaborative effort, the HPTLC Association develops and maintains the "International HPTLC Atlas for Identification of Herbal Drugs" (Atlas), a database and reference tool for setting specification and acceptance criteria for quality and quality control of herbal drugs.

FOCUS ON BRAIN HEALTH

FEED YOUR MIND,
FILL YOUR LIFE

At every age and latitude in the world, brain health plays a huge part in who we are, how well we live our life, and what we can offer the people around us. Challenged by today’s fast-paced world and longer life expectancy, it can lead to complex issues that affect our memory, focus, sleep, stress and relaxation, and cognitive performance.

That’s why we have selected from our portfolio 4 botanical, food-grade supplements for brain health, to support and maintain specific functions with a non-invasive, natural, holistic approach.

MEET OUR GOLDEN QUARTET
FOR BRAIN HEALTH

GINKGO BILOBA EXTRACT WITH PHOSPHATIDYLSERINE

Remember with Virtiva® Plus

A proprietary formulation that leverages the interactions between Ginkgo biloba and phosphatidylserine-rich sunflower lecithin, able to improve mental and memory performance even after a single dose.

MAINTAIN YOUR MEMORY

GRAPE SEED EXTRACT

React with Enovita®

An OPC-rich grape seed extract resulting from a highly circular process. Well known to support cardiovascular health and endothelial function – and an effective ally in reducing perceived stress and worries.

BALANCE YOUR LIFE

THE ORIGINAL BILBERRY EXTRACT

Restore with Mirtoselect®

A standardized Vaccinium myrtillus L. extract that retains the full anthocyanin pattern of natural bilberry fruit, well known for its ability to significantly improve microcirculation and visual acuity.

AID YOUR FLEXIBILITY

MELISSA INDENA PHYTOSOME™

Relax with Relissa™

A standardized, non-melatonin botanical ingredient with optimized biological performance, validated to support relaxation, sleep balance, positive moods and thoughts and offer neuroprotective and antioxidant effects.

66% of supplement users in the US, UK and Germany said transparency increases the likelihood they’ll purchase a product

Ingredient Transparency Center (ITC) surveys thousands of consumers and practitioners throughout the U.S., U.K., and Germany on an annual basis to help companies validate market assumptions, learn about consumer mindsets, compare year over year attitudes and behaviors, and uncover insights into emerging and poorly understood ingredients. ITC delivers insights, defines a global strategy, and leads the implementation of effective action in the market.

Get a step ahead now

The Industry Transparency Center (ITC) is a strategy and insights firm driving transparency in the health ingredients and natural products industries through four key pillars: Insights, Stewardship, Strategy, and Community. ITC provides guidance to organizations across the globe via strategic insights, category stewardship, world-class events and thought leadership. ITC also operates the Global Prebiotic Association, Global Curcumin Association, Collagen Stewardship Alliance and Coconut Coalition of the Americas.

WELCOME

ISURA is Canada’s only independent, not-for-profit natural health supplement and food product verification and certification organization. ISURA serves as an analytical competence centre for the analysis of natural health products, raw food and supplement materials at all stages of processing.

We provide comprehensive certification services and analytical laboratory testing, and act as an advocacy platform for Canada’s vibrant natural health supplement and food industries. ISURA conducts more than half a million analytical tests each month.  ISURA certification means more accountability in the natural health industry, better products and informed choices for Canadian consumers.

ISURA’s quality management system is ISO9001 certified and its laboratory is ISO17025 accredited for specific laboratory methods.

The natural health and organic product and functional foods industry contributes over $11 billion to the Canadian economy. With this immense role in maintaining the health and well-being of Canadians, the industry recognizes the need for more accountability and innovation in the product, formulations, raw materials and services provided to the public.

We collectively support the public’s health and safety by setting and maintaining best practices for our clients, which ultimately improves the health of Canadian consumers.




ISURA ARTICLES

Differences in Metabolite Profiles of Dihydroberberine and Micellar Berberine in Caco-2 Cells and Humans—A Pilot Study
A Comparison and Safety Evaluation of Micellar versus Standard Vitamin D3 Oral Supplementation in a Randomized, Double-Blind Human Pilot Study
New ISURA Study: Evaluation of the Metabolite Profile of Fish Oil Omega-3 Fatty Acids (n-3 FAs) in Micellar and Enteric-Coated Forms—A Randomized, Cross-Over Human Study

ISURA TWITTER FEED
ISURA STANDARD & THRESHOLD LIMITS
SCIENTIFIC ADVISORY COMMITTEE

The Scientific Advisory Committee (SAC) provides ISURA with expert scientific advice on the full spectrum of topics relating to testing protocols. Learn more.

SAC member, Dr. Michael Smith, was honoured by the Natural Health Product Research Society of Canada with their prestigious 2017 Neil Towers Award.



WHY IS ISURA CERTIFICATION IMPORTANT?

GROWER:

ISURA certified product, is a demonstration of your commitment to organic and non-GMO farming. It’s one vital label that captures all your hard-work and values in making your produce the best possible choice for your family, friends and community.

MANUFACTURER:

An ISURA certified product gives your company the opportunity to verify your product or raw materials for quality, purity and potency through our state-of-the art testing facilities. Through our comprehensive approach, we are able to assess all stages of handling and processing that will help maximize your profits and increase productivity.

RETAILER:

An ISURA certified product gives your store the opportunity to showcase the best in natural health products, raw food and supplements. Through our comprehensive approach and state-of-the-art testing facilities, we are also able to assess how your store can fully contribute to the success of these products and increase your earning potential.

CONSUMER:

When you see ISURA Verified Clean on a product label, it means that product has undergone a stringent battery of laboratory tests to confirm that its ingredients are:

Non-GMO compliant,
Contaminant-free,
Adulterant-free,
Authenticated, and
Accurately and inclusively labelled

as required by ISURA’s standards.



Every time you purchase an ISURA certified product, you help strengthen the natural health supplement and food product industry’s commitment to responsible and accountable practices. You cast your vote for premium quality products that support your health, wellbeing and safety.

Hi there,
I’m Patrick Sullivan Jr.

My dad and I started Jigsaw Health in 2005. My dad struggled with various health challenges for 30+ years —fatigue, trouble sleeping, and gastrointestinal problems, to name but a few…

“Figuring out causes of my own health problems always felt like solving a puzzle. Thus, the company name, Jigsaw Health.”

- Pat Sullivan, Sr.

It’s discouraging...
to always feel bad and not know why; to go to doctors and be told there is nothing wrong with you when you know there is. It’s not supposed to be that way!

At Jigsaw Health, we’ll help you find your health answers. We promise you, there is hope.

We out-hug the competition

While every company claims to have the best customer service, most companies just want you to be loyal to them. Jigsaw Health does the opposite and strives to be a loyal friend to you.

Need a friendly voice? Call us at 1-888-352-5050.

There’s a hug coming your way. :)

We pass the test!

Every product is triple-tested, and the lab results from an independent third party are posted online for all to see. We believe that what’s on the label is what should be in the bottle, and nothing else.

Jigsaw products have
17,000+ 5-star reviews

We love our products and we believe you will too. However, if you are not completely satisfied, please contact us within 90 days and we will gladly refund 100% of your purchase.

Marian Boardley has been an independent consultant since 2008, assisting over 60 clients in achieving compliance with regulatory standards such as 21 CFR Part 111 for Dietary Supplements. Her services encompass a wide range of solutions, including:

Dietary supplement cGMP compliance and audits
Label reviews and mockups for Supplement Facts
Responding to FDA 483s and Warning Letters
Developing testing strategies for supplements and ingredients
Supplier qualification and audits
Creating SOPs, master manufacturing records, and specifications
Technical and laboratory documentation
Quality assurance project management
Food safety plans and FSMA compliance (PCQI)

Marian's expertise aids manufacturers and distributors in navigating FDA requirements for dietary supplements. She advises on current GMPs, conducts audits, and establishes procedures for quality assurance and manufacturing. Her proficiency extends to identity testing, raw materials, lab instrumentation, and documentation creation. She's also a certified Preventive Controls Qualified Individual under the Food Safety Modernization Act.

MUSHROOM EXTRACTS

Real mushrooms, organically cultivated and naturally grown as nature intended. Concentrated into a form that provides benefits so you know your product actually works.

VERIFIED BY SCIENCE

You deserve to know that the products you buy are active. We have pioneered testing of mushroom extracts and continue to set the industry standard. We guarantee active compounds verified by scientific analysis.

AN INDUSTRY LEADER

We have 40 years of experience to allow you to make informed decisions about which mushrooms are right for your product line.

View our mushroom extracts »

Discover our testing methods »

How we can help you »

YOUR SOURCE FOR CONSISTENT QUALITY IN MUSHROOMS

The trend toward a healthier diet and lifestyle will be reinforced and supported by the new paradigm shift in food that is currently known as functional foods. This category, defined as they are by science, must be supported by scientifically sound product specifications and formulations. It is therefore incumbent upon companies that enter this arena to take up the challenge of offering truly effective products capable of enhancing health.

Reishi Mushroom Extract

Scientific research into the compounds responsible for Reishi mushroom activity began in the 1970’s in China and Japan. Scientists discovered highly active beta-(1>3)-glucans with the ability to potentiate innate immunity by activating immune cells. Also discovered were secondary metabolites called triterpenoids which were present in significant amounts and sets Reishi apart from all the other medicinal mushrooms.

Cordyceps Mushroom Extract

A large body of research as well as traditional use has demonstrated that Cordyceps militaris has similar active compounds and activities to Ophiocordyceps sinensis. Today, for the first time, C. militaris fruiting bodies, rather than mycelium, are available. Not only that, they are being cultivated on substrates free from any insects. It is now absolutely certain that your Cordyceps product is genuine.

Lion’s Mane Mushroom Extract

Lion’s Mane is a choice edible that grows wild on deciduous trees and is now extensively cultivated on sawdust substrates. Hericium erinaceus is an immunomodulator that is useful for many conditions where immunity is compromised. It has also been traditionally used for stomach ailments. Current research suggests that Hericium erinaceus may help mitigate age related cognitive decline.

See Our Entire Line of Organic Mushroom Extracts »

We have worked for over 20 years with our Chinese partners to produce products in a sustainable manner without the use of agricultural chemicals. This has allowed us to reach a quality standard that few other companies can meet.

Because we focus entirely on mushrooms, we have been able to identify the active compounds in our products with an aggressive program of research and development. Our mushroom extracts are defined by scientific analysis. This means that you can guarantee to your customers that the important active compounds for which mushrooms are well known will be present. The Nammex mushroom testing fingerprint is fast becoming the industry standard.

Quality is at the heart of everything we do.

Since 2001, the National Animal Supplement Council has helped to improve the lives of millions of animals given supplements by their caretakers. Our leadership and advocacy actions have helped NASC members attain the highest standards of quality and vigilance and have shaped and secured the future of an industry so many animals rely on to live healthier, happier lives.

Our Mission
Membership Tiers
Primary Suppliers
NASC Primary Supplier members supply the marketplace with finished animal health and nutritional supplements for dogs, cats and horses. Primary Suppliers that fulfill the requirements of the NASC Quality Audit are eligible to display the yellow NASC Quality Seal on their products and in marketing materials.
About Primary Suppliers
›
Preferred Suppliers
The NASC Preferred Supplier program qualifies companies providing raw materials, manufacturing, lab testing, and other products and services. NASC Primary Suppliers can confidently source from them without additional vendor qualification. Preferred Suppliers may display the blue NASC Preferred Supplier logo in their marketing.
About Preferred Suppliers
›
Regulators
The NASC Regulator membership is for employees of state and federal regulatory agencies whose job duties include overseeing animal health and nutritional supplements. It provides NASC resources designed to promote a deeper understanding of the regulatory landscape and foster collaboration that enhances the industry.
About Regulators
›
Retailers
The NASC Retailer membership is for employees of pet stores, veterinary clinics, farm stores, supermarkets, general merchandise stores, and e-commerce retailers. It provides NASC resources that foster a deeper understanding of animal supplement labeling requirements and claims boundaries, and why the NASC Quality Seal is a credible and trusted mark of quality.
About Retailers
›
Apply to Join
The NASC Quality Seal

Many pet owners today who experience the benefits of supplements want the same for their pets. When it comes to supplements, similar ingredients don’t always mean similar quality. A side-by-side label comparison won’t tell you where ingredients were sourced or whether the supplier has a quality assurance and product testing program in place.

That’s where the NASC Quality Seal comes in.

Look for the yellow Quality Seal on supplements for dogs, cats and horses to know you’re buying from responsible suppliers that pass a comprehensive third-party audit and maintain ongoing compliance with rigorous NASC quality requirements.

Companies must earn the NASC Quality Seal—it cannot be purchased.

Featured Products
Mag Threonate
Mag Threonate provides unique, multidimensional support to promote healthy brain function including mental focus, memory, sleep and mood support. Mag Threonate delivers 2 g of concentrated magnesium L-threonate in only two capsules.
HiPhenolic
HiPhenolic is a high-concentration, highly purified polyphenolic blend that provides multidimensional support to maintain normal blood pressure levels, manage weight, and increase satiety and appetite control.
Turiva®
Turiva® is a full-spectrum turmeric product that contains an exclusive blend of bioactive nutrients. It is a natural turmeric matrix standardized to contain curcuminoids, turmeric oils and turmerin protein, along with many other active turmeric compounds that deliver comprehensive support.
Ortho Spore Complete
Ortho Spore Complete is a spore-based, broad-spectrum probiotic formula designed to maintain diversity and balance in the gut microbiota and support gastrointestinal health after SIBO.
Diaxinol®
Diaxinol® is a cutting-edge cardiovascular supplement combining well-studied natural ingredients and appropriate dosages for those seeking to maintain balanced blood sugar levels.
Probiotic 225
Probiotic 225 is a maximum-strength probiotic for cases of acute gastrointestinal (GI) and immune challenges.
GlutaShield Chocolate
GlutaShield is designed to promote the health and barrier function of the gastrointestinal lining.

We Are
Your Strategic Sourcing Partner

At Pharmore Ingredients, we’re dedicated to sourcing the highest quality ingredients for dietary supplements in both human and animal food industries, and have been doing so for over 20 years!

View Products

Pharmore Quality

Pharmore’s team is committed to supplying dietary supplement and food ingredients to the human and animal nutrition industries that are manufactured in cGMP compliant facilities while exceeding customer specifications.
​

Since 2001, Pharmore’s Quality Team has audited more than 500 ingredient manufacturers around the world. We select only the best facilities to manufacturer the ingredients we provide to our customers.

 

To accomplish this, Pharmore’s Quality Program:

Conducts recurrent on-site audits 

Implements continuous cGMP improvement programs

Performs 3rd party verification testing

Provides detailed documentation

Foreign Supplier Verification Program (FSVP) implementation

HACCP analysis

Independent audits

Supplier performance assessments

​

Pharmore's Quality Team consists of PCQI and FSVP certified and qualified individuals that are available to assist you with navigating new regulations and product risk assessments.

Request a Quote
Sustainable Manufacturing

Pharmore Ingredients supplies ingredients from manufacturers that adhere to sustainability and effectively utilizes their resources in effort to minimize global environmental impact and conserve natural resources.

Pharmore Ingredients is committed to providing quality ingredients. Part of this commitment is through strategic sourcing and partnering with suppliers that share the same values.

​

We have overseas staff to support our quality initiatives and develop those relationships critical to our supply chain. Through conducting recurrent on-site audits, we select only the best facilities as manufacturers for ingredients we provide to our customers.  

Ingredient Spotlight
Shellfish-free Glucosamine 

The same great product as our Glucosamine Powder, but derived from fermentation, making it crustacean-free and allergen-free! Both Glucosamine HCl and Glucosamine Sulfate 2KCl forms are available. 

Collagen

This new Collagen Powder comes from the same trusted source as our well renowned Chondroitin Sulfate. Made with the highest quality raw materials we offer a variety of Collagen forms.

A Service Company

We are more than just an ingredient supplier. We offer extensive support and expertise to our customers 

Industry Expert & Long-term Partners

Pharmore Ingredients is staffed by a team of industry experts in procurement, strategic sourcing, regulatory compliance and quality control with over 100+ years of combined experience. We offer variety of solutions finding ingredients you need worldwide. We are happy to provide our customers with  frequent on-time deliveries, great communication on forecasting and more. 

Worldwide Sourcing with FSVP Compliance

Pharmore Ingredients Quality Control is backed by PCQI and FSVP certified qualified individuals, both in U.S. and overseas. As an importer and distributor, we handle FSVP regulatory responsibilities including 3rd party verification laboratory testing and on-site auditing which saves our customers valuable time and money.

Supply Chain Traceability & Document Compliance

Pharmore Ingredients takes pride in our exceptional customer service. We can a fulfill variety of our customers needs. We provide ample documentation to keep you in compliance manage you supply chain. Examples include Certificate of Analysis, Halal and Kosher Certificates, Third Party Audits, Specifications, Non-GMO, etc. 

Qualified Experts

We understand the manufacturing technology for each of the facilities we select. We have overseas staff to support our quality initiatives and develop those relationships critical to our supply chain. Our quality team is knowledgeable and able to provide assistance to customers when formulation issues or testing challenges arise.

Quality You Can Trust

We stand behind the quality and efficacy of every one of our products because we sustainably and meticulously source the best ingredients globally, using excipient-free manufacturing processes, 100% solvent-free, vegan-friendly capsules, and conducting rigorous testing on each batch.

We proudly maintain certification through independent quality verification organizations, including NSF, Organic, Kosher, and Non-GMO verified. We strive for purity, potency, efficacy, and transparency in sourcing and manufacturing authenticated through third-party testing.

Our Story

In 1987, Dr. Marshall, PhD, CCN, and his partner, Dr. Linda Forbes, DC, L.Ac., CCN, established Premier Research Labs to provide reliable access to unadulterated, high-quality supplements from energetically charged ingredients that can positively enhance health and overall vitality.

We uphold their vision through our commitment to premier quality and innovative formulas for holistic wellness.

Our Process

We manufacture all our supplements in the USA, source the highest quality ingredients globally, ensure their integrity in every product, reject compromises, and consistently develop new products using cutting-edge research and technology. 

Join us in our commitment to excellence and innovation, driving the future of nutritional science forward.

WHITEPAPER
The Power of Traceability: A 10-Step Roadmap
Published on July 20, 2024
About half of US supplement consumers are most likely to purchase a supplement brand that is transparent in all it does to assure proof of quality, trust, and safety. And the main way to demonstrate those attributes is through traceability. Learn why traceability is so effective, which supplement brands are getting it right, and how our 10-step road map can guide your brand's traceability program.
PODCAST
NutraCast: Pure Branding Leverages Psychographic Segmentation to Capture Consumer Sentiment
Published on August 9, 2024
Danielle Masterson of NutraIngredients-USA interviews Pure Branding CEO, Yadim Medore, on the importance of psychographic consumer segmentation in the supplement marketplace, where he highlights takeaways from its census-balanced market research that segments and captures supplement consumer attitudes and behaviors pre and post-pandemic.
ARTICLE
The Doctor is In (and Everywhere Else Too): All Practitioner Supplement Brands are Now Omnichannel Brands
by Yadim Medore | Published on October 4, 2023
The last decade has been characterized by marketplace adaptation. HCP brands, which previously committed to maintaining exclusivity within the HCP channel, now face the imperative of reevaluating their strategies. Brands must now confront the imperative of enhancing their marketing competencies in both business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-consumer (B2C) spheres to maintain their relevance and standing in this evolving landscape.
ARTICLE
Five Tips for Launching a Thriving DTC Supplement Brand This Year
by Samantha Brewster | Published on February 1, 2024
Ten years ago, the first successful direct-to-consumer (DTC) supplement brands – like Ritual and Care/of – were launched in a landscape that is markedly different than today. How can entrepreneurs succeed within a shifting ecosystem where the cost to acquire and sustain customers is incredibly high? 
ARTICLE
Supplement Brand Transparency: Think TV Series, Not Movie
by Peter Littell | Published on June 1, 2023
Many dietary supplement brands are under the false impression that becoming fully transparent will take years of time, effort, and resources. They believe becoming fully transparent is like making a major motion picture — years in the making, one all-encompassing story, and expensive. You release it once and hope it makes an impact. However, we advise brands to stop thinking about transparency like their big movie. Instead, we recommend they approach transparency as if it were a television series, metaphorically speaking.
ARTICLE
The Six Costs of Entry for DTC Supplement Brands
by Samantha Brewster | Published on March 21, 2023
DTC e-commerce sales have tripled in the past six years, and analysts predict sales will reach $150–$200 billion in the next several years. It’s clear the DTC trend has hit critical mass, and everyone wants a piece of the pie—including the supplement industry. Although digitally native brands are still enjoying double-digit growth, the days of their domination of DTC e-commerce may be coming to an end as legacy brands ramp up their presence. What does this mean for supplement brands trying to succeed through the DTC channel?
ARTICLE
Four Warning Signs of Legacy Supplement Brand Decline
by Yadim Medore | Published on September 3, 2019
It’s not easy being a legacy dietary supplement brand. With the supplement industry reaching revenues of $45 billion, many legacy brands are struggling to maintain their market share in an increasingly crowded and competitive market. From our experience working with legacy supplement brands, we have identified a number of warning signs that are to be ignored at one’s own peril.
ARTICLE
10 Tips for Supplement Personalization Success
by Samantha Brewster | Published on September 22, 2022
Does this sound familiar? A new product experiences year over year dramatic growth relative to overall supplement market growth. The product is dominated by those who pioneered it at first, but then every supplement company wants in. So is supplement personalization the new CBD?
ARTICLE
Why Successful Supplement Brands Don’t Lead with the Science
by Yadim Medore | Published on May 15, 2019
Science is critically important because it ensures that your products are effective, and you’re using the right ingredient in the right dose. But when everyone is making the same claims, science becomes the cost of entry at best, and just noise to the consumer at worst.

BINDING

RT Binding is our multi-line operation providing small-to-medium binding placements and programs on a national basis. Simply stated, our underwriters are here to provide solutions to your clients’ insurance needs with authority enabling a quick turnaround to secure coverage regardless of the complexity of risk.

LEARN MORE

RT Connector is RT Specialty’s proprietary Digital Marketplace for Small Commercial E&S Business and Cyber Liability. The coverage process is streamlined, top-rated market access is multiplied, and robust third-party tools are harnessed to allow the RT Specialty contracted agent to rate, quote, bind and issue a policy within minutes.

LEARN MORE
Why RT

RT Specialty is a leading wholesale distributor of specialty insurance products and services. Our experienced brokers are specialized in property, casualty, professional lines, transportation and workers’ compensation, providing creative solutions to retail brokerage firms. We define ourselves through our superior execution on behalf of our clients, which has established us as a leader in the industry.

As an independent wholesale broker, we are a critical intermediary in the distribution channel from insurance carriers and retail brokers.

RT Specialty’s mission is simple – we believe clients are best served by a team of professionals who work collaboratively and collectively through a meaningful partnership among agents, brokers and carriers. RT Specialty works together with retail agents and insurance carriers to provide innovative solutions to their clients’ most complex insurance needs.

Our Difference

RT Specialty’s differentiator is its people. RT Specialty has some of the highest quality brokers in the wholesale sector who work tirelessly on behalf of and with their clients to ensure the solution to the risk is optimized for the win. Time and again, RT Specialty emphasizes execution. Backed by our relationships, resources, and the trust we have developed in the marketplace, we deliver measurable value to the insurance industry through a national wholesale brokerage platform with offices throughout the United States.

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR PRODUCTS

Our Values

At RT Specialty, we embrace our values as they set the foundation for what our firm represents.

Integrity

We adhere to the highest standards of honesty, dependability and professionalism in dealing with our clients, trading partners and co-workers.

Client-Centricity

We put our clients’ and trading partners’ interests first.

Teamwork

We achieve more working collaboratively than individually.

Meritocracy

Our people are given the opportunity to grow, achieve and rise based on their merits, their skill and their imagination.

Inclusion

We are committed to building, growing and sustaining a diverse workforce reflective of society throughout the entirety of the organization and insurance industry. We harness our differences and commonalities to better serve our clients, trading partners, workforce and communities.

Empowerment

Our organizational structure allows our people to take appropriate risks, be decisive and succeed on the basis of their initiative and hard work, enabling them to self-optimize.

Innovation

We encourage our people to be creative and discover new and better ways to achieve optimal results for our clients and trading partners.

Courage

We don’t shy away from difficult challenges, rather, we embrace them knowing we have the drive and expertise to find ideal solutions.

DESDE 1904

Ingredientes naturales para la Industria Alimentaria

ODS 1: Fin de la Pobreza

El 10% de la población mundial aún vive en situación de extrema pobreza con dificultades para satisfacer las necesidades más básicas.

 

Nuestro producto, los ingredientes naturales , es la base de una buena alimentación, es por ello que en Sabater queremos que mejorar la base de una vida digna basándonos en la salud, la educación y el acceso al agua y saneamiento, entre otras, llevando a cabo proyectos solidarios.

ODS 5: Igualdad de Género

En Sabater contamos con una cultura corporativa inclusiva, diversa y comprometida: el 14% de la plantilla son mujeres y están en todos los niveles de la organización. En el plano de la gestión de nuestros recursos humanos, la no discriminación y el respeto a la diversidad son la base de las relaciones laborales.

 

El acceso al empleo, la formación, la promoción profesional, la conciliación y la equiparación de las condiciones de trabajo son claves para alcanzar la igualdad plena en nuestro entorno laboral.

 

Luchamos por transmitir esta cultura corporativa a lo largo de toda nuestra cadena de suministros.

ODS 13: Acción por el clima

Sin duda, nuestro mayor hito para frenar el cambio climático es ser reconocidos con el Sello de la Huella de Carbono.

 

Como empresa, tenemos en marcha acciones concretas de reducción de consumos, energía y materiales en cada delegación, así como de minimización de residuos.

 

Tenemos el firme compromiso de trasladarlo en cada punto de nuestra cadena de suministro.

ODS 17: Alianzas para lograr los objetivos

Creemos que la mejor manera de lograr estos objetivos globales es colaborando con otras entidades, tanto públicas como privadas, para intercambiar conocimiento e innovación, alineando esfuerzos con un fin común: construir entre todos una sociedad y un planeta mejor, más justo y equilibrado.

 

Por todo ello, apostamos por el asociacionismo empresarial a nivel regional, nacional e internacional.

Sonoran University of Health Sciences (formerly Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine & Health Sciences) is a fully-accredited university[1] dedicated to a comprehensive team approach to health sciences education in the fields of medicine, nutrition, and mental health. Complementing patient care with innovative research and natural medicine backed by science[2], both Sonoran University students and graduates are using a uniquely different mindset to change healthcare.

Sonoran University’s on-site Doctorate of Naturopathic Medicine degree program blends unique opportunities for learning like the Neil Riordan Center for Regenerative Medicine with an evolving curriculum that keeps pace with changing medicine. Sonoran University’s College of Nutrition offers two fully online Master of Science degrees, one in Clinical Nutrition and the other tailored to executives for Nutrition Business Leadership. Sonoran University’s newest School of Mental Health features the Master of Science in Clinical Mental Health Counseling degree program. All three of our virtual master’s programs combine flexible online access with the clinical and scientific knowledge to become an advanced health care professional.

A Degree Program to Fit Your Schedule

OUR VISION

Specializing in marketing risk analysis and practical marketing solutions on the web, social media, and product labels. Founded by Principal Asa Waldstein, a dietary supplement expert with 20 years of experience developing and implementing compliant marketing and cGMP manufacturing processes. Asa has formulated, manufactured, and marketed hundreds of products in a compliant manner and has helped oversee three FDA CFR 111 audits without any 483s. Asa decided after years as an executive for other companies the best use of his skills was to open Supplement Advisory Group to serve the greater supplement marketplace.

Learn More

Strategies & stories that win.

Sustainability is a business opportunity. ERM Shelton can help you communicate it.

LET'S TALK
We've been doing sustainability communications since before there was such a thing as sustainability communications.

We are sustainability communications and marketing specialists, working at the intersection of science and storytelling.

We help businesses unlock value from doing the right thing. We translate decarbonization strategy, environmental progress and disclosure into market advantages through language and action that build reputational value, drive brand preference, improve sales and investor outcomes, and attract and retain employees.

Part of the world’s leading sustainability consulting firm, ERM, we were shaping behavior and driving change long before “sustainability communications” was ever typed into a Google search field. It is this legacy, coupled with our deep market insights and exceptional communications craft, that differentiates us from the pack — and delivers impact for our clients.

SEE HOW WE SOLVE
Our featured insights report

People are getting better at spotting greenwashing. So why aren’t brands getting better at avoiding it? Communicating sustainability is an increasingly complex challenge. And the messaging bull's-eye is constantly moving due to a variety of factors, from ever-evolving sustainability language (that resonates or alienates) to ever-evolving laws and regulations.

READ OUR LATEST REPORT
A unique kind of sustainability agency — and then some:
LET'S TALK
GET OUR BI-WEEKLY INSIGHTS

Founded in 1991, we’ve been focused on sustainability communications since 2005. Today our team of researchers, creatives and account experts specialize in winning sustainability communications. In a crowded market of greenwashers, greenhushers and greenwishers, you can count on us to articulate and amplify real sustainability stories with authenticity, creativity and impact. Because when you tell a better story, you can build a better planet — and a better business.

A LEADER IN CONTRACT MANUFACTURING

As a leader in Contract Manufacturing for Nutritional Supplements, Natural Products, Nutraceuticals, and Vitamins, Tishcon Corp. provides product development, manufacturing, and marketing for some of the largest supplement brands in the USA and across the globe.

Tishcon is one of a select group of manufacturers that produce all their products in-house.

Our cGMP-certified USA facilities in New York and Maryland are certified by NSF® and UL® and employ the latest technology in manufacturing and packaging. 

Tishcon also maintains in-house capabilities for qualitative, quantitative, and microbiological testing, as well as our own product development and R&D capabilities.

Guiding Companies to Success: A Journey of Trust
THE REAL IMPACT OF TRUST
From Mentorship in 2003 to Exit Values of Over $1 Billion.
In 2003 Scott began mentoring and guiding a business in his spare time. As the years went by Scott implemented what is now the TrustTransparency framework. Creating trust through organizational and interpersonal transparency: In 2012 Scott took on the role of CEO leveraging the consistent methodology of TrustTransparency to increase the sale value of that company. Today Scott has created over $1 Billion in enterprise value for exiting owners of five companies through consistent transparency.

This is what the power of Transparency can do for you and your organization.
Learn About Our Values

We at Trust Transparency Consulting (TTC) believe that strong values, create the basis of all strong relationships. Integrity, dilligence, professionalism, compassion, these are all things present in strong leadership, but how do we move you and your organization forward to be true industry leaders?

1
Transparency
In every action, in every thought, trust cannot exist without complete unwavering transparency.
2
Stewardship
A brand worthy of trust must embody the principles of honest, thoughtful, and careful governance. 
3
Partnership
A trustworthy brand must partner with equally transparent organizations to maintain that trust.
4
Leadership
Leading by example to be a true Transparency Ambassador elevates all within the industry.

Healthy Begins Here

TSI Group works together with one goal in mind — to create value for our brand partners and their customers. At TSI, we have teams of researchers, scientists, regulatory specialists, and product development experts — each working in tandem to help create solutions for improving health.

We lead the world in best-in-class research, innovative ingredients and solutions for unmet consumer health needs.

We are more than a global ingredient company. We solve tough formulation problems for better consumer brand loyalty and greater compliance.

Did you know?
90% fewer waste by-products

GlucosaGreen® virtually eliminates the environmental impact inherent to chitin-derived shellfish production by reducing carbon footprint by 70% when compared to shellfish-derived options and over 90% fewer waste by-products.

Discover more
150 human clinical studies traceable

myHMB® is one of the most studied nutritional ingredients available. In the last three decades, more than 150 human studies, 100 review articles and 14 meta-analyses have shown its effectiveness and safety.

Discover more
‘NEW’ is at the core of the consumer choice
Surveying over half a million consumers over the years, the Natural Marketing Institute found that 30% of Gen Y consumers prefer to get supplements in other forms than pills and capsules. That’s why TSI created FZZR™.
Discover more
More Than an Antioxidant
Hobamine® is notably not an antioxidant because it allows our bodies to continue their normal processes like cell signaling and immune function while minimizing the adverse effects of oxidative stress.
Discover more
Increases blood flow by up to 54%
PEAK ATP® also supports exercise performance by enhancing Vasodilation. This supports improved oxygen and nutrient delivery and improved waste removal from the muscle during and after exercise.

Better results made easier in less time
Optimized Ingredients identify ways to improve processes so materials are specifically tailored to customer needs.

TECH ENABLED AD STRATEGIES
Born from the Amazon Marketing Cloud (AMC)

From our world-class technology to our winning advertising services, we’ve built our entire business around the Amazon Marketing Cloud.

Increase sales and profitability

WBX Glass® is our proprietary advertising technology with robust first-party data management.

We combine first-party and third-party data to create unparalleled shopper insights.

We leverage those shopper insights to formulate custom audiences and target them across the Amazon DSP.

WBX Glass® automatically delivers actionable data on a recurring schedule, providing faster feedback and revenue growth.

FEATURED CASE STUDY

Relentless Amazon growth

Our technology enables our advertising management team to manage campaigns precisely and efficiently. For each of our partners, we optimize, scale, and automate campaigns to get the greatest return on each investment. You can focus on building a portfolio of great products and leave the heavy lifting of your Amazon growth to us.

WBX manages Amazon advertising for a health and wellness brand selling vitamins. The brand had a goal to diversify sales away from just their top selling SKUs. Our advertising management team activated an audience geared toward cross-promoting products within their portfolio, resulting in a 15% increase in sales of the cross-promoted vitamins in the first 90 days.

+15%

increase in sales in 90 days

Our success crosses any endemic Amazon vertical, from CPG to Health and Wellness to Toys and Games. We’re confident WBX can be the catalyst for your success on Amazon.

TECHNOLOGY

WBX Glass® is your window into AMC

WBX Glass makes it easy to unlock the power of the Amazon Marketing Cloud.
